message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You started high, I'll meet you in the middle!
You're getting closer, but I still want a bit more!
Getting closer, but I'm not giving up yet!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still want a slight edge!
You're close, but I'm not going to give up my edge so easily!
I think we're getting close, let's meet in the middle again!
